title: Otsu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar ULQ; ULQ
description: a line of three oxen-pulled carts with full loads enters the scene at R; at LL, a figure fills water buckets from a fountain; women gather in a shop behind the fountain; two village buildings, a wall, and bamboo thickets line the street; faint mountain in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
